languages.text: "С помощью крови и {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священных карт{/g} я совершаю гадания, пытаясь расслышать, что шепчет Неумирающий". {n}В голосе Кибеллы звучат трепет и почтение.{/n} "Его Таро — не ответ, но вопрос, который я задаю бесконечности. Вопрос, на который мироздание отвечает своим вопросом. И в этой беседе без ответов мне открываются сотни исходов. Все они — правда. И все они — лишь видение. Что действительно. Что непременно будет... Я знаю и не знаю одновременно".

traits.locale_text: "С помощью крови и {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священных карт{/g} я совершаю гадания, пытаясь расслышать, что шепчет Неумирающий". {n}В голосе Кибеллы звучат трепет и почтение.{/n} "Его Таро — не ответ, но вопрос, который я задаю бесконечности. Вопрос, на который мироздание отвечает своим вопросом. И в этой беседе без ответов мне открываются сотни исходов. Все они — правда. И все они — лишь видение. Что действительно. Что непременно будет... Я знаю и не знаю одновременно".

languages.text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."
languages.original_text: "С помощью крови и {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его священных карт{/g} я совершаю гадания, пытаясь расслышать, что шепчет Неумирающий". {n}В голосе Кибеллы звучат трепет и почтение.{/n} "Его Таро — не ответ, но вопрос, который я задаю бесконечности. Вопрос, на который мироздание отвечает своим вопросом. И в этой беседе без ответов мне открываются сотни исходов. Все они — правда. И все они — лишь видение. Что действительно. Что непременно будет... Я знаю и не знаю одновременно".

traits.locale_text: "I take blood and His sacred cards, and I read the omens, trying to make out the Undying Emperor's whispers." {n}There is reverence and awe in Kibellah's voice.{/n} "His Tarot are not an answer, but a question I ask of infinity. A question to which all of existence responds with a question of its own. And in that answerless communion, I see hundreds of outcomes. Each one is true. Each is naught but a vision. As for which are certain to come... I know, and yet I know not."

"I take blood and His sacred cards, and I read the omens, trying to make out the Undying Emperor's whispers." {n}There is reverence and awe in Kibellah's voice.{/n} "His Tarot are not an answer, but a question I ask of infinity. A question to which all of existence responds with a question of its own. And in that answerless communion, I see hundreds of outcomes. Each one is true. Each is naught but a vision. As for which are certain to come... I know, and yet I know not."

In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

languages.text: «Utilicé sangre para interpretar {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sus sagradas cartas{/g} y oír el susurro del Inmortal». {n}La voz de Kibellah está impregnada de un respeto reverencial.{/n} «Su tarot no es una respuesta, sino una pregunta que formulo al universo... y el universo contesta haciendo sus propias preguntas. Esta sacrosanta comunión me permite vislumbrar centenares de desenlaces posibles. Todos ellos son veraces, y al mismo tiempo son meras visiones. Conozco el porvenir... y sin embargo, lo ignoro».
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

traits.locale_text: «Utilicé sangre para interpretar Sus sagradas cartas y oír el susurro del Inmortal». {n}La voz de Kibellah está impregnada de un respeto reverencial.{/n} «Su tarot no es una respuesta, sino una pregunta que formulo al universo... y el universo contesta haciendo sus propias preguntas. Esta sacrosanta comunión me permite vislumbrar centenares de desenlaces posibles. Todos ellos son veraces, y al mismo tiempo son meras visiones. Conozco el porvenir... y sin embargo, lo ignoro».

languages.text: 「私は血を介して{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}聖なるカード{/g}を読み、不死の者の囁きを聞くの」{n}キベラの声には敬虔な畏敬の念が満ちている。{/n}「主のタロットは答えではなく、私が宇宙に投げかける問いかけであり…宇宙はそれ自身の問いかけで答える。この神聖な交歓の中で、私は何百もの可能性を感じるの。それらはすべて真実であり、けれど幻影にすぎない。私は何が起きるのかを知っていて…何も知らない」
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

traits.locale_text: 「私は血を介して聖なるカードを読み、不死の者の囁きを聞くの」{n}キベラの声には敬虔な畏敬の念が満ちている。{/n}「主のタロットは答えではなく、私が宇宙に投げかける問いかけであり…宇宙はそれ自身の問いかけで答える。この神聖な交歓の中で、私は何百もの可能性を感じるの。それらはすべて真実であり、けれど幻影にすぎない。私は何が起きるのかを知っていて…何も知らない」

languages.text: “我会用鲜血来解读{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}不死之神的圣牌{/g}，聆听祂的低语。”{n}绮贝菈的声音中充满了虔诚的敬畏。{/n}“祂的圣牌并不是答案，而是我向宇宙提出的问题……而宇宙会用它自己的问题来回答问题。在这神圣的交流期间，我会感知到几百种可能会发生的结果。所有的结果都是真实的，而一切又只是幻景而已。我知道会发生什么事情……而我又什么都不知道。”
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

traits.locale_text: “我会用鲜血来解读不死之神的圣牌，聆听祂的低语。”{n}绮贝菈的声音中充满了虔诚的敬畏。{/n}“祂的圣牌并不是答案，而是我向宇宙提出的问题……而宇宙会用它自己的问题来回答问题。在这神圣的交流期间，我会感知到几百种可能会发生的结果。所有的结果都是真实的，而一切又只是幻景而已。我知道会发生什么事情……而我又什么都不知道。”

languages.text: "Ich benutze Blut, um {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Seine heiligen Karten{/g} zu deuten und das Flüstern des Todlosen zu hören." {n}In Kibellahs Stimme liegt Ehrfurcht.{/n} "Sein Tarot ist keine Antwort, sondern eine Frage, die ich dem Universum stelle ... und das Universum antwortet mit eigenen Fragen. Bei dieser heiligen Kommunion nehme ich Hunderte möglicher Verläufe wahr. Sie sind alle wahr, und doch sind sie nur Visionen. Ich weiß, was passieren wird ... und gleichzeitig weiß ich es nicht."
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

traits.locale_text: "Ich benutze Blut, um Seine heiligen Karten zu deuten und das Flüstern des Todlosen zu hören." {n}In Kibellahs Stimme liegt Ehrfurcht.{/n} "Sein Tarot ist keine Antwort, sondern eine Frage, die ich dem Universum stelle ... und das Universum antwortet mit eigenen Fragen. Bei dieser heiligen Kommunion nehme ich Hunderte möglicher Verläufe wahr. Sie sind alle wahr, und doch sind sie nur Visionen. Ich weiß, was passieren wird ... und gleichzeitig weiß ich es nicht."

languages.text: « Le sang me permet d'interpréter les {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}cartes sacrées de l'Immortel{/g} et d'entendre Ses murmures. » {n}La voix de Kibellah est empreinte de révérence et de ferveur.{/n} « Son tarot n'est pas une réponse en soi, mais une question que j'adresse à l'univers... et l'univers répond à son tour par d'autres questions. À la faveur de cette sainte communion, je perçois des centaines d'issues possibles. Toutes sont authentiques, et pourtant, ce ne sont jamais que des visions. Je sais ce qui adviendra... et en même temps, je ne sais rien. »
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

À la faveur de cette sainte communion, je perçois des centaines d'issues possibles. Toutes sont authentiques, et pourtant, ce ne sont jamais que des visions. Je sais ce qui adviendra... et en même temps, je ne sais rien. »

In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."

languages.text: "Kan kullanarak {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}O'nun kutsal kartlarına{/g} bakar ve Ölmeyen'in fısıltısını duyarım." {n}Kibellah'nın sesine hürmetkâr bir huşu hâkim.{/n} "O'nun Tarotu bir cevap değil, evrene sorduğum bir sorudur... Evren de kendi sorularıyla cevap verir. Bu kutsal ayinde yüzlerce olası sonucu algılarım. Hepsi hem gerçektir hem de sırf görüden ibarettir. Olacakları hem bilirim... Hem de bilmem."
languages.original_text: "I use blood to read {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His sacred cards{/g} and hear the whisper of the Undying One." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with reverent awe.{/n} "His Tarot is not an answer, but a question I ask of the universe... and the universe answers with questions of its own. In this sacred communion, I perceive hundreds of possible outcomes. They are all true, and yet they are only visions. I know what will come to pass... and yet I do not."
